channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: At home with jim and joy
channel.desc: Dynamic husband and wife radio team Jim and Joy Pinto bring their powerful witness to daytime TV with special guests and topics focusing on marriage, family, and pro-life issues.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Catholic Enlightenment
channel.desc: Of Catholicism To Civilisation. Fr Marcus Holden and Fr Andrew Pinsent demonstrate how Catholic teachings fostered creativity in the arts, architecture and the foundation of hospitals.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Daily mass
channel.desc: The Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with the friars each day from the EWTN Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. LIVE Monday through Saturday at 8 am Eastern.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes Grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Women of grace
channel.desc: Karlo Broussard continues to remove the mask of new relativism, pointing out its inconsistencies and flaws in doctrine while also addressing the dangers and challenges it presents.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Encounter the vocational journey Bishop James Conley experienced as he progressed from his Presbyterian roots to explore the Great Books and become Catholic during college.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Ewtn news nightly

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Debbie Cowden and her panel of experts offer suggestions for Catholic moms who aim to discover God centered ways for designing their homes as domestic churches.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Door of faith
channel.desc: Fr Bede McGregor explains the central role that faith plays in ordination.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick
channel.desc: Bear and the rest of the bikers head down to Texas' Big Bend Country.
